sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: (and Bor-tzuen therefore) ordered his right-hand man to step down and whip him.

sense.def: official travel companion; travel official on the right

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: The cart-puller said:

sense.def: cart-puller

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "In the time you spend in whipping me

sense.def: during the time while

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: you could have travelled a fair distance (c)."

sense.def: travel, cover a distance

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Have you, Master, any information about this?"

sense.def: =有所 have something which one Vs

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Have you, Master, any information about this?"

sense.def: what one has learnt; what one has heard about; information

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and has obstructed the flow of the river for three days."

sense.def: flow

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Mount Liang has collapsed

sense.def: collapse

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and Heaven at will make them collapse.

sense.def: cause to collapse

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and Heaven may at will obstruct its flow.

sense.def: block the flow of or in

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "The ruler should in person put on (a mourning dress of) plain white silk and (a cap of) white silk,

sense.def: wear, personally; put on personally

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "The ruler should in person put on (a mourning dress of) plain white silk and (a cap of) white silk,

sense.def: fine plain silk garments

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon the River will flow."

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: lead the assembled ministers and lament over this.

sense.def: lament, wail about; conduct ritual wailing on the occasion of the funeral of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Thereafter he should perform a sacrifice there,

sense.def: Thereupon

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "Bor-tzuen ought not to have any descendants (e),

sense.def: own desendents
figurative: reject
category of people 五民
marking questions consisting of a question pronoun only
marking questions consisting of a question pronoun only
marks a judgmental question sentence 何謂也What does this mean?
marks a judgmental question sentence 何謂也What does this mean?
N is used as a name for the word itself, i.e. is autonymous in Bertrand Russell's terminology
marking that N{PRED} classifies the autonymous N{SUBJ}
marking that N{PRED} classifies the autonymous N{SUBJ}
(The expression) means "to V" here/in this context
是無法也“This is lawlessness": "this is an instance of" marks the classification of a subject as being an instance of the unmarked nominalisation of a VP
無法也“This is lawlessness": "this is an instance of" marks the classification of a subject as being an instance of the unmarked nominalisation of a VP

seg.line: 猶曰取之其母之懷中而殺之云爾，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶曰取之其母之懷中而殺之云爾，

sense.def: double particle marking the end of quotation
(The expression) means "to V" or "suggests that V" here/in this context
(the expression N{SUBJ}) is an/is to be classified as N{PRED}
in relation to, as regards, as far as N is concerned.
to what purpose? why?
to what purpose? why?
to what purpose? why?

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: "King" is the more honourable designation,

sense.def: the nobler, the more honourable, the more revered

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: "King" is the more honourable designation,

sense.def: designation for things

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: "Viscount" is the humbler designation.

sense.def: the humbler, the less distinguished

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: "Viscount" is the humbler designation.

sense.def: designation for things

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: in order to participate in the meeting of the feudal lords

sense.def: postverbal modal particle of doubtful semantic force, often marking the generalising and non-narratively punctual continuative modality of the verb

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: in order to participate in the meeting of the feudal lords

sense.def: meet with, get together with; join forces with

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: is designed to

sense.def: heavenly, as if the heaven's N

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: before one can even get to mention the headgear he wants the headgear.

sense.def: before V, already S

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: before one can even get to mention the headgear he wants the headgear.

sense.def: be physically able to; have the capacity to VERB properly, be constitutionally able to VERB; be physically capable of, be actually able to; would ever be able to

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: before one can even get to mention the headgear he wants the headgear.

sense.def: official headgear; hat for ceremonial use

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: before one can even get to mention the headgear he wants the headgear.

sense.def: desire (objects) 甚欲; want to have; hanker after

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: before one can even get to mention the headgear he wants the headgear.

sense.def: 我無是也“I do not have such": "it may be said that, it is a fact that", "the point is" marks a judgemental non-narrative verbal sentence, often as being basic or expanatory

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: Bring along that splendid headgear!

sense.def: comely, handsome; splendid

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: Bring along that splendid headgear!

sense.def: official headgear; hat for ceremonial use

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: Bring along that splendid headgear!

sense.def: cause to come> bring and submit (typically to one's superior)
a meeting, assembly
[ADVANCE-FIG>] make progress
go through with something, bring something to completion; bring something to perfection; succeed; accomplish; achieve in the end, achieve eventually; realise
viscounthood
of a barbarian nature

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: they

sense.def: cut off; cut (the hair)

seg.line: 因晉之權而請冠端而襲

tls:text.tls:srcline: 因晉之權而請冠端而襲

tls:line.title: Research Notes for 春秋穀梁傳

tls:text.tls:line: and to rely on the power of Jìn, and they asked for official headgear and

sense.def: official dress
or is it possibly that S?
not be in order toV(0)
important matter/task/undertaking in N
